item.title: SML on macOS
item.description: Standard ML on macOS I had a chance to complete Programming Languages, Part A by Dan Grossman from University of Washington. Dan is a great teacher and this is definitely an A+ course. Installation Installing SML/NJ in macOS (recommend using homebrew): https://smlnj.org/dist/working/110.96/macos.html Remember to export the path in bash/zsh My SML development environment Install Visual Studio Code: https://code.visualstudio.com Install Standard ML plugin: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=freebroccolo.sml Open terminal and enter SML/NJ shell load the SML code in editing (Important) Tune your SML/NJ interactive shell: Note that SML/NJ interactive shell doesn’t support array keys so you can’t use up/down to cycle through the history.
